### NodeMCU
* D1, D5, D6, D7 - LED
* D4 - Relay IN
* D2 - Indicator LED
* D0 - LDR D0
* 3V - LDR, Relay Vcc
* GND - LED, Relay, LDR GND
NodeMCU is connected to powerbank/charger USB

### Pump
+ve - Relay COM
-ve - Powerbank/charger USB -ve

### Relay
Relay NO is connected to Powerbank/charger USB +ve
